entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 1:48 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: S 37 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries and rain showers beginning this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7 except minus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 late this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then periods of snow mixed with rain. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
